GE07bhg4c12u:2: evaṃ satata-yuktā ye bhaktās tvāṃ paryupāsate /
GE07bhg4c12u:3: ye cāpy akṣaram avyaktaṃ teṣāṃ ke yoga-vittamāḥ //1//
GE07bhg4c12u:6: śreyaḥ katarad ity etan nirṇetuṃ dvādaśodyamaḥ //
GE07bhg4c12u:7: pūrvādhyāyānte mat-karma-kṛn mat-parama [Gītā 11.55] ity evaṃ bhakti-niṣṭhasya śreṣṭhatvam uktam /
GE07bhg4c12u:8: kaunteya pratijānīhīty [Gītā 9.31] ādinā ca tatra tatra tasyaiva śreṣṭhatvaṃ nirṇītam /
GE07bhg4c12u:9: tathā teṣāṃ jñānī nitya-yukta eka-bhaktir viśiṣyata [Gītā 7.17] ity ādinā sarvaṃ jñāna-plavenaiva vṛjinaṃ santariṣyasi [Gītā 4.36] ity ādinā ca jñāna-niṣṭhasya śreṣṭhatvam uktam /
GE07bhg4c12u:10: evam ubhayoḥ śraiṣṭhye 'pi viśeṣa-jijñāsayā śrī-bhagavantaṃ praty arjuna uvāca evam iti /
GE07bhg4c12u:11: evaṃ sarva-karmārpaṇādinā satata-yuktās tvan-niṣṭhāḥ santo ye bhaktās tvāṃ viśva-rūpaṃ sarvajñaṃ sarva-śaktiṃ paryupāsate dhyāyanti /
GE07bhg4c12u:12: ye cāpy akṣaraṃ brahmāvyaktaṃ nirviśeṣam upāsate /
GE07bhg4c12u:13: teṣām ubhayeṣāṃ madhye ke 'tiśayena yoga-vido 'tiśreṣṭhā ity arthaḥ //1//
GE07bhg4c12u:16: nirvairaḥ sarva-bhūteṣu yaḥ sa mām eti pāṇḍava //
GE07bhg4c12u:18: tatra mac-chabdārthe sandehaḥ kiṃ nirākāram eva sarva-svarūpaṃ vastu mad-chabdenoktaṃ bhagavatā kiṃ vā sākāram iti /
GE07bhg4c12u:20: bahūnāṃ janmanām ante jñānavān māṃ prapadyate /
GE07bhg4c12u:21: vāsudevaḥ sarvam iti sa mahātmā sudurlabhaḥ // [Gītā 7.19]
GE07bhg4c12u:24: nāhaṃ vedair na tapasā na dānena na cejyayā /
GE07bhg4c12u:25: śakya evaṃ-vidho draṣṭuṃ dṛṣṭavān asi māṃ yathā // [Gītā 11.53]
GE07bhg4c12u:27: ubhayoś ca bhagavad-upadeśayor adhikāri-bhedenaiva vyavasthayā bhavitavyam anyathā virodhāt /
GE07bhg4c12u:28: tatraivaṃ sati mayā mumukṣuṇā kiṃ nirākāram eva vastu cintanīyaṃ kiṃ vā sākāram iti svādhikāra-niścayāya sa-guṇa-nirguṇa-vidyayor viśeṣa-bubhutsayā arjuna uvāca evam iti /
GE07bhg4c12u:30: bhagavat-karmādau sāvadhānatayā pravṛttā bhaktāḥ sākāra-vastv-eka-śaraṇāḥ santas
GE07bhg4c12u:31: tvām evaṃ-vidhaṃ sākāraṃ ye paryupāsate satataṃ cintayanti /
GE07bhg4c12u:32: ye cāpi sarvato viraktās tyakta-sarva-karmāṇo 'kṣaraṃ na kṣaraty aśnute vety akṣaram
GE07bhg4c12u:33: etad vai tad akṣaraṃ gārgi brāhmaṇā abhivadanty asthūlam anaṇv ahrasvam adīrgham
GE07bhg4c12u:35: ataevāvyaktaṃ sarva-karaṇāgocaraṃ nirākāraṃ tvāṃ paryupāsate teṣām ubhayeṣāṃ madhye ke yoga-vittamāḥ atiśayena yoga-vidaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:36: yogaṃ samādhiṃ vindanti vidantīti vā yoga-vida ubhaye 'pi /
GE07bhg4c12u:37: teṣāṃ madhye ke śreṣṭhā yoginaḥ keṣāṃ jñānaṃ mayānusaraṇīyam ity arthaḥ //1//
GE07bhg4c12u:43: śraddhāvān bhajate yo māṃ sa me yuktatamo mataḥ // [Gītā 6.47]
GE07bhg4c12u:45: tathaivopasaṃhāre 'pi tasyā evaṃ sarvotkarṣaṃ śrotu-kāmaḥ pṛcchati /
GE07bhg4c12u:46: evaṃ satata-yuktā mat-karma-kṛn mat-paramaḥ [Gītā 11.55] iti tvad-ukta-lakṣaṇā bhaktās
GE07bhg4c12u:47: tvāṃ śyāmasundarākāraṃ ye ca avyaktaṃ nirviśeṣam akṣaraṃ etad vai tad akṣaraṃ gārgi
GE07bhg4c12u:48: brāhmaṇā abhivadanty asthūlam anaṇv ahrasvam [BAU 3.8.9] ity ādi-śruty-uktaṃ brahma upāsate /
GE07bhg4c12u:49: teṣām ubhayeṣāṃ yoga-vidāṃ madhye ke 'tiśayena yogavidaś ca tva-prāntau śreṣṭham upāyaṃ jānanti na labhante vā /
GE07bhg4c12u:50: te yoga-vittarā iti vaktavye yoga-vittamā ity uktir yoga-vittarāṇām api bahūnāṃ madhye ke yogavittamā ity arthaṃ bodhayati //1//
GE07bhg4c12u:53: prāpayet tvarayā yan mām ity āha dvādaśe hariḥ //
GE07bhg4c12u:54: jīvātmānaṃ yathāvaj jñātvā vijñāya ca tad-aṃśī harir dhyeya iti avināśi tu tad viddhi [Gītā 2.17] ity ādibhir dvitīyādiṣv ekaḥ panthā varṇitaḥ
GE07bhg4c12u:55: jīvātmānaṃ harer aṃśaṃ jñātvaiva tad-aṃśī haris tac-chravaṇādi-bhaktibhir dhyeya iti mayy āsakta-manāḥ pārtha [Gītā 7.1] ity ādibhiḥ saptamādiṣu dvitīya-panthāḥ pradarśitaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:56: teṣv eva prayāṇa-kāle [Gītā 8.10] ity ādinā yogopasṛṣṭā /
GE07bhg4c12u:57: jñāna-yajñena cāpy anye [Gītā 9.15] ity anena jñānopasṛṣṭā ca bhaktir uktā /
GE07bhg4c12u:58: bhakti-ṣaṭkāt prāk ṣaṣṭhānte kevalāṃ bhaktim upadekṣyatā yoginām api sarveṣāṃ [Gītā 6.47] ity ādi-padyena svaikāntinām yuktatamatāṃ cābhihitā
GE07bhg4c12u:60: evaṃ mayy āsakta-manāḥ pārtha [Gītā 7.1] ity ādi-tvad-ukta-vidhayā satata-yuktā ye tvāṃ śyāmasundaraṃ kṛṣṇaṃ
GE07bhg4c12u:62: ye cākṣaraṃ jīva-svarūpaṃ cakṣur-ādibhir avyaktaṃ paryupāsate dhāraṇādhyāna-samādhibhiḥ
GE07bhg4c12u:63: sākṣāt-kartum īhante paramātma-kāmās teṣām ubhayeṣāṃ madhye yoga-vittamāḥ śīghropāyinaḥ ke bhavanti ?
GE07bhg4c12u:65: svānubhava-pūrvakasya hari-dhyānasya bandha-mūlatvāt tena nirvighnā tat-prāptir ity eke /
GE07bhg4c12u:67: kintu hari-bhaktir eva sarva-vighna-vimardinī hari-prāpaṇīty eke /
GE07bhg4c12u:68: tasyām eva niratās teṣām ubhayeṣām upāyeṣu kaḥ śreyān upāya iti taṃ bhaṇeti //1//
GE07bhg4c12u:71: mayy āveśya mano ye māṃ nitya-yuktā upāsate /
GE07bhg4c12u:72: śraddhayā parayopetās te me yuktatamā matāḥ //2//
GE07bhg4c12u:73: śrīdharaḥ - tatra prathamāḥ śreṣṭhā ity uttaraṃ śrī-bhagavān uvāca mayīti /
GE07bhg4c12u:76: nitya-yuktā mad-artha-karmānuṣṭhānādinā man-niṣṭhāḥ santaḥ śreṣṭhayā śraddhayā yuktā ye mām ārādhayanti te yuktatamā mamābhimatāḥ //2//
GE07bhg4c12u:78: viśvanāthaḥ --- tatra mad-bhaktāḥ śreṣṭhā ity āha mayi śyāmasundarākāre mama āveśyāviṣṭaṃ kṛtvā nitya-yuktā man-nitya-yoga-kāṅkṣiṇaḥ parayā guṇātītayā śraddhayā / yad uktaṃ -
GE07bhg4c12u:79: sāttviky ādhyātmikī śraddhā karma-śraddhā tu rājasī /
GE07bhg4c12u:80: tāmasy adharme yā śraddhā mat-sevāyāṃ tu nirguṇā // [BhP 11.25.27] iti /
GE07bhg4c12u:81: te me madīyā ananya-bhaktā yuktatamā yoga-vittamā ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:82: tenānanya-bhaktebhyo nyūnā anye jñāna-karmādi-miśra-bhaktimanto yoga-vittarā ity artho 'bhivyañjito bhavati /
GE07bhg4c12u:83: tataś ca jñānād bhaktiḥ śreṣṭhā bhaktāv apy ananya-bhaktiḥ śreṣṭhety upapāditam //2//
GE07bhg4c12u:84: baladevaḥ - evaṃ pṛṣṭho bhagavān uvāca mayīti /
GE07bhg4c12u:85: ye bhaktā mayi nīlotpala-śyāmalatvādi-dharmiṇi svayaṃ bhagavati devakī-sūnau mana āveśya nirataṃ kṛtvā parayā dṛḍhayā śraddhayopetāḥ santo mām ukta-lakṣaṇam upāsate /
GE07bhg4c12u:87: nitya-yuktā nityaṃ mad-yogam icchantas te mama matena yuktatamā matāḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:90: ye tv akṣaram anirdeśyam avyaktaṃ paryupāsate /
GE07bhg4c12u:91: sarvatra-gam acintyaṃ ca kūṭastham acalaṃ dhruvam //3//
GE07bhg4c12u:93: te prāpnuvanti mām eva sarva-bhūta-hite ratāḥ //4//
GE07bhg4c12u:94: śrīdharaḥ - tarhītare kiṃ na śreṣṭhā iti ?
GE07bhg4c12u:95: ata āha ye tv iti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c12u:96: ye tv akṣaram paryupāsate dhyāyanti te 'pi mām eva prāpnuvantīti dvayor anvayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:106: madhusūdanaḥ - nirguṇa-brahma-vid-apekṣayā saguṇa-brahma-vidāṃ ko 'tiśayo yena ta
GE07bhg4c12u:107: eva yuktatmās tavābhimatā ity apekṣāyāṃ tam atiśayaṃ vaktuṃ tan nirūpakān nirguṇa-brahma-vidaḥ
GE07bhg4c12u:109: ye 'kṣaram mām upāsate te 'pi mām eva prāpnuvantīti dvitīya-gatenānvayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:111: akṣaraṃ nirviśeṣaṃ brahma vācaknavī-brāhmaṇe prasiddhaṃ tasya samarpaṇāya sapta viśeṣaṇāni /
GE07bhg4c12u:112: anirdeśyaṃ śabdena vyapadeṣṭum aśakyaṃ yato 'vyaktaṃ śabda-pravṛtter nirviśeṣe pravṛtty-ayogāt /
GE07bhg4c12u:113: kuto jātyādi-rāhityam ata āha sarvatra-gaṃ sarva-vyāpi sarva-kāraṇam /
GE07bhg4c12u:116: ataevācintyaṃ śabda-vṛtter iva mano-vṛtter api na
GE07bhg4c12u:120: tarhi kathaṃ taṃ tv aupaniṣadaṃ puruṣaṃ pṛcchāmi iti /
GE07bhg4c12u:121: dṛśyate tv agryayā buddhyā iti ca śrutiḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:123: ucyate, avidyā-kalpita-sambandhena śabda-janyāyāṃ buddhi-vṛttau caramāyāṃ paramānanda-bodha-rūpe
GE07bhg4c12u:124: śuddhe vastuni pratibimbite 'vidyā-tat-kāryayoḥ kalpitayor nivṛtty-upapatter upacāreṇa
GE07bhg4c12u:126: atas tatra kalpitam aivdyā-sambandhaṃ pratipādayitum āha kūṭasthaṃ,
GE07bhg4c12u:127: yan mithyā-bhūtaṃ satyatayā pratīyate tat-kūṭam iti lokair ucyate /
GE07bhg4c12u:129: ajñānam api māyākhyaṃ saha kārya-prapañcena mithyā-bhūtam api laukikaiḥ satyatayā
GE07bhg4c12u:130: pratīyamānaṃ kūṭaṃ tasminn ādhyāsikena sambandhenādhiṣṭhānatayā tiṣṭhatīti kūṭastham
GE07bhg4c12u:133: kṛtaḥ / ataeva sarva-vikārāṇām avidyā-kalpitatvāt tad-adhiṣṭhānam sākṣi-caitanyaṃ nirvikāram ity āha acalaṃ calanaṃ vikāraḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:135: etādṛśaṃ śuddhaṃ brahma māṃ paryupāsate śravaṇena pramāṇa-gatām asambhāvanām apohya
GE07bhg4c12u:136: mananena ca prameya-gatām anantaraṃ viparīta-bhāvanā-nivṛttaye dhyāyanti vijātīya-pratyaya-tiraskāreṇa
GE07bhg4c12u:139: kathaṃ punar viṣayendriya-saṃyoge sati vijātīya-pratyaya-tiraskāro 'ta āha saṃniyamya sva-viṣayebhya upasaṃhṛtyendriya-grāmaṃ karaṇa-samudāyam
GE07bhg4c12u:141: viṣaya-bhoga-vāsanāyāṃ satyāṃ kuta indriyāṇāṃ tato nivṛttis tatrāha sarvatra viṣaye
GE07bhg4c12u:142: samā tulyā harṣa-viṣādābhyāṃ rāga-dveṣābhyāṃ ca rahitā matir yeṣāṃ samyag-jñānena
GE07bhg4c12u:143: tat-kāraṇasyājñānasyāpanītatvād viṣayeṣu doṣa-darśanābhyāsena spṛhāyā nirasanāc ca
GE07bhg4c12u:146: ataeva sarvatrātma-dṛṣṭyā hiṃsā-kāraṇa-dveṣa-rahitatvāt sarva-bhūta-hite ratāḥ abhayaṃ
GE07bhg4c12u:147: sarva-bhūtebhyo mattaḥ svahā iti mantreṇa datta-sarva-bhūtābhaya-dakṣiṇāḥ kṛta-saṃnyāsā
GE07bhg4c12u:148: iti yāvat abhayaṃ sarva-bhūtebhyo dattvā saṃnyāsam ācaret iti smṛteḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:149: evaṃvidhāḥ sarva-sādhana-sampannāḥ santaḥ svayaṃ brahma-bhūtā nirvicikitsena sākṣātkāreṇa sarva-sādhana-phala-bhūtena mām akṣaraṃ brahmaiva te prāpnuvanti
GE07bhg4c12u:150: / pūrvam api mad-rūpā eva santo 'vidyā-nivṛttyā mad-rūpā eva tiṣṭhantīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:153: ihāpi ca jñānī tv ātmaiva me matam [Gītā 7.14] ity uktam //3-4//
GE07bhg4c12u:154: viśvanāthaḥ --- madīya-nirviśeṣa-brahma-svarūpopāsakās tu duḥkhitatvāt tato nyūnā ity āha ye tv iti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c12u:160: eka-rūpatayā tu yaḥ kāla-vyāpi sa kūṭasthaḥ ity amaraḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:163: mām evety akṣarasya tasya matto bhedābhāvāt //3-4//
GE07bhg4c12u:164: baladevaḥ - ye tu sva-sākṣāt-kṛti-pūrvikāṃ mad-upāsanāṃ na kurvanti,
GE07bhg4c12u:165: teṣām api mat-prāptiḥ syād eva kintv atikleśenāticireṇaivāntas tebhyo 'pakṛṣṭās ta ity āha ye tv iti tribhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:166: ye tv akṣara-svātma-caitanyam eva pūrvam upāsate /
GE07bhg4c12u:168: akṣaraṃ viśinaṣṭi anirdeśyaṃ dehād bhinnatvena dehābhidhāyibhir deva-mānavādi-śabdair nirdeṣṭum aśakyam /
GE07bhg4c12u:170: acintyaṃ tarkāgamyaṃ śruti-mātra-vedyam jñāna-svarūpam eva jñātṛ-svarūpam acalaṃ jñānatvād api calana-rahitam /
GE07bhg4c12u:173: karaṇa-grāmaṃ śrotrādīndriya-vṛndaṃ saṃniyamya śabdādi-saṃcārebhyas tad-vyāpārebhyaḥ pratyāhṛtya
GE07bhg4c12u:175: yad vā, sarveṣu cetanācetaneṣu vastuṣu sthite same brahmaṇi buddhir yeṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ
GE07bhg4c12u:176: hite upakāre ratāḥ sarveṣāṃ śaṃ bhūyād iti yathāyathaṃ yatamānāḥ evaṃ svātma-sākṣātkṛti-pūrvikāyāṃ
GE07bhg4c12u:178: te 'pi mām eva pāramaiśvarya-pradhānaṃ prāpunuvantīti nāsti saṃśayaḥ //3-4//
GE07bhg4c12u:181: avyaktā hi gatir duḥkhaṃ dehavadbhir avāpyate //5//
GE07bhg4c12u:182: śrīdharaḥ - nanu ca te 'pi cet tvām eva prāpnuvanti tarhītareṣāṃ yuktatamatvaṃ kuta ity apekṣāyāṃ kleśākleśa-kṛtaṃ viśeṣam āha kleśa iti tribhiḥ
GE07bhg4c12u:183: avyakte nirviśeṣe 'kṣara āsaktaṃ ceto yeṣāṃ teṣāṃ kleśo 'dhikataraḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:184: hi yasmād avyakta-viṣayā gatir niṣṭhā dehābhimānibhir duḥkhaṃ yathā bhavaty evam avāpyate /
GE07bhg4c12u:186: madhusūdanaḥ - idānīm etebhyaḥ pūrveṣām atiśayaṃ darśayann āha kleśa iti /
GE07bhg4c12u:187: pūrveṣām api viṣayebhya āhṛtya saguṇe mana-āveśe satataṃ tat-karma-parāyaṇatve ca para-śraddhopetatve ca kleśo 'dhiko bhavaty eva /
GE07bhg4c12u:188: kintu avyaktāsakta-cetasāṃ nirguṇa-brahma-cintana-parāṇāṃ teṣāṃ pūrvokta-sādhanavatāṃ kleśa āyāso 'dhikataro 'tiśayenādhikaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:189: atra svayam eva hetum āha bhagavān -- avyaktā hi gatiḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:190: hi yasmād akṣarātmakaṃ gantavyaṃ phala-bhūtaṃ brahma duḥkhaṃ yathā syāt tathā kṛcchreṇa dehavadbhir deha-mānibhir avāpyate /
GE07bhg4c12u:191: sarva-karma-saṃnyāsaṃ kṛtvā gurum upasṛtya vedānta-vākyānāṃ tena tena vicāreṇa tat-tad-bhrama-nirākaraṇe mahān prayāsaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:192: pratyakṣa-siddhas tataḥ kleśo 'dhikataras teṣām ity uktam /
GE07bhg4c12u:193: yadyapy ekam eva phalaṃ tathāpi ye duṣkareṇopāyena prāpnuvanto bhavanti śreṣṭhā ity abhiprāyaḥ //5//
GE07bhg4c12u:194: viśvanāthaḥ --- tarhi kenāṃśena teṣām apakarṣas tatrāha kleśa iti /
GE07bhg4c12u:195: na kenāpi vyajyata ity avyaktaṃ brahma tatraivāsakta-cetasāṃ tad evānububhūṣūṇāṃ teṣāṃ tat-prāntau kleśo 'dhikataraḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:196: hi yasmād avyaktā gatiḥ kenāpi prakāreṇa vyaktībhavatisā gatir dehavadbhir jīvair duḥkhaṃ yathā bhavaty evam avāpyate /
GE07bhg4c12u:199: ata indriya-nirodhas teṣāṃ nirviśeṣa-jñānam icchatām avaśya-kartavya eva /
GE07bhg4c12u:200: indriyāṇāṃ nirodhas tu srotasvatīnām iva sroto-nirodho duṣkara eva /
GE07bhg4c12u:208: tat tvaṃ harer bhagavato bhajanīyam aṅghriṃ
GE07bhg4c12u:210: tāvatā kleśenāpi sā gatir yadyapy avāpyate /
GE07bhg4c12u:212: bhagavati bhaktiṃ vinā kevala-brahmopāsakānāṃ tu kevala-kleśa eva lābho na tu brahma-prāptiḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:216: baladevaḥ - nanu te 'pi cet tvām eva prāpnuyus tarhi pūrveṣāṃ yuktatamatvaṃ kiṃ nibandhanam ?
GE07bhg4c12u:219: yadyapi pūrveṣām api tat-tan-mad-bhakty-asaṅga-samācāro mad-anya-viṣayebhyaḥ karaṇānāṃ pratyāhāraś ca kleśo 'sty eva,
GE07bhg4c12u:220: tathāi tatrānanda-mūrter mama sphuraṇān na kleśatayā vibhāti /
GE07bhg4c12u:222: hi yasmād avyaktā gatir avyaktākṣara-viṣayā mano-vṛttir dehavadbhir dehābhimānibhir janair duḥkhaṃ yathā syāt tathāvāpyate /
GE07bhg4c12u:223: dehavantaḥ khalu sthūla-deham eva sucirād ātmatvenānuśīlitavantaḥ katham aṇu-caitanyaṃ sucirojjhita-vimarśam ātmatvenānuśīlituṃ prabhaveyur iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:226: tatra saguṇopāsanam ākāravad-viṣayatvāt sukaram apramādaṃ ca /
GE07bhg4c12u:227: nirguṇopāsanaṃ tu tattvābhāvād duḥkha-karaṃ sa-pramādaṃ ca /
GE07bhg4c12u:233: śrutiś ca - yato vāco nivartante aprāpya manasā saha [TaittU 2.4.1] ity ādyā /
GE07bhg4c12u:234: kūṭasthaṃ mithā-bhūtam api satyavat pratītaṃ jagat kūṭam ucyate /
GE07bhg4c12u:237: acaram avikāram ato dhruvaṃ nityam iti /
GE07bhg4c12u:242: tad idaṃ mandaṃ gati-sāmānyāt iti sūtre brahmaṇo dvairūpya-nirāsāt /
GE07bhg4c12u:243: yathā tad akṣaram adhigamyate iti tasya veda-vedyatva-śravaṇāt /
GE07bhg4c12u:245: pravṛtti-nimittābhāvena nirguṇasyāpramāṇatvāt taucchyāc ca lakṣyatvaṃ tu na,
GE07bhg4c12u:247: sadaikāvasthasya vastunaḥ kūṭasthatvenābhidhānān na ca jagat kūṭam /
GE07bhg4c12u:252: ye tu sarvāṇi karmāṇi mayi saṃnyasya mat-parāḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:255: bhavāmi na cirāt pārtha mayy āveśita-cetasām //7//
GE07bhg4c12u:256: śrīdharaḥ - mad-bhaktānāṃ tu mat-prasādād anāyāsenaiva siddhir bhavatīty āha ye tv iti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c12u:257: ye mayi parameśvare sarvāṇi karmāṇi saṃnyasya samarpya mat-parā bhūtvā /
GE07bhg4c12u:259: ananyena na vidyate 'nyo bhajanīyo yasmiṃs tenaiva /
GE07bhg4c12u:261: teṣām iti / evaṃ mayy āveśitaṃ ceto yais teṣām /
GE07bhg4c12u:262: mṛtyu-yuktāt saṃsāra-sāgarād ahaṃ samyag uddhartācireṇa bhavāmi //7//
GE07bhg4c12u:263: madhusūdanaḥ - nanu phalaikye kleśālpatvādhikyābhyāsam utkarṣa-nikarṣau syātāṃ,
GE07bhg4c12u:264: tad eva tu nāsti nirguṇa-brahma-vidāṃ hi phalam avidyā-tat-kārya-nivṛttyā nirviśeṣa-paramānanda-bodha-brahma-rūpatā /
GE07bhg4c12u:265: saguṇa-brahma-vidāṃ tv adhiṣṭhāna-pramāyā abhāvenāvidyā-nivṛtty-abhāvād aiśvarya-viśeṣaḥ kārya-brahma-loka-gatānāṃ phalam /
GE07bhg4c12u:266: ataḥ phalādhikyārtham āyāsādhikyaṃ na nyūnatām āpādayatīit cet,
GE07bhg4c12u:267: na suguṇopāsanayā nirasta-sarva-pratibandhānāṃ vinā gurūpadeśaṃ vinā ca śravaṇa-manana-nididhyāsanādy-āvṛtti-kleśaṃ
GE07bhg4c12u:270: sa etasmāj jīva-ghanāt parātparaṃ puriśayaṃ puruṣam
GE07bhg4c12u:271: īkṣate iti śruteḥ sa prāpta-hiraṇyagarbhaiśvaryo bhogānta etasmāj jīva-ghanāt sarva-jīva-samaṣṭi-rūpāt
GE07bhg4c12u:272: parāc chreṣṭhād dhiraṇyagarbhāt paraṃ vilakṣaṇaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ ca puriśayaṃ sva-hṛdaya-guhā-niviṣṭaṃ
GE07bhg4c12u:273: puruṣaṃ pūrṇaṃ pratyag-abhinnam advitīyaṃ paramātmānam īkṣate svayam āvirbhūtena
GE07bhg4c12u:276: tathā ca vināpi prāg-ukta-kleśena saguṇa-brahma-vidām īśvara-prasādena nirguṇa-brahma-vidyā-phala-prāptir itīmam artham āha ye tv iti dvyābhyām
GE07bhg4c12u:278: ye sarvāṇi karmāṇi mayi saṃnyasya saguṇe vāsudeve samarpya mat-parā ahaṃ bhagavān
GE07bhg4c12u:279: vāsudeva eva paraḥ prakṛṣṭaḥ prīti-viṣayo yeṣāṃ te tathā santo 'nanyenaiva yogena
GE07bhg4c12u:280: na vidyate māṃ bhagavantaṃ muktvānyad-ālambanaṃ yasya tādṛśenaiva yogena samādhinaikānta-bhakti-yogāpara-nāmnā
GE07bhg4c12u:281: māṃ bhagavantaṃ vāsudevaṃ sakala-saundarya-sāra-nidhānam ānanda-ghana-vigrahaṃ dvibhujaṃ
GE07bhg4c12u:282: caturbhujaṃ vā samasta-jana-mano-mohinīṃ muralīm antimanoharaiḥ saptabhiḥ svarair
GE07bhg4c12u:284: vā yathā-darśita-viśva-rūpaṃ vā dhyāyanta upāsate samānākāram avicchinnaṃ citta-vṛtti-pravāhaṃ
GE07bhg4c12u:285: saṃtanvate samīpa-vartitayā 'sate tisṭhanti vā tesāṃ mayy āveśita-cetasāṃ
GE07bhg4c12u:286: mayi yathokta āveśitam ekāgratayā praveśitaṃ ceto yais teṣām ahaṃ satatopāsito bhagavān
GE07bhg4c12u:287: mṛtyu-saṃsāra-sāgarām mṛtyu-yukto yaḥ saṃsāro mithyā-jñāna-tat-kārya-prapañcaḥ sa
GE07bhg4c12u:288: eva sāgarā iva duruttaras tasmāt samuddhartā samyag anāyasenordhve sarva-bādhāv adhibhūte
GE07bhg4c12u:289: śuddhe brahmaṇi dhartā dhārayitā jñānāvaṣṭambha-dānena bhavāmi na cirāt kṣipram eva
GE07bhg4c12u:292: viśvanāthaḥ --- bhaktānāṃ tu jñānaṃ vinaiva kevalayā bhaktyaiva sukhena saṃsārān muktir ity āha ye tv iti /
GE07bhg4c12u:293: mayi yat prānty arthaṃ saṃnyasya tyaktvā saṃnyāsa-śabdasya tyāgārthatvāt /
GE07bhg4c12u:294: ananyenaiva jñāna-karma-tapasyādi-rahitenaiva yogena bhakti-yogena yad uktaṃ yat karmabhir yat tapasā jñāna-vairāgyataś ca yat [BhP 11.20.32] ity anantaram /
GE07bhg4c12u:296: svargāpavargaṃ mad-dhāma kathañcid yadi vāñchati // [BhP 11.20.33] iti /
GE07bhg4c12u:297: nanu tad api teṣāṃ saṃsāra-taraṇe kaḥ prakāra iti cet ? satyaṃ /
GE07bhg4c12u:299: yatas tat-prakāraṃ vinaivāham eva tāṃs tārayiṣyāmīty āha teṣām iti /
GE07bhg4c12u:300: tena bhagavato bhakteṣv eva vātsalyaṃ na tu jñāniṣv iti dhvaniḥ //6-7//
GE07bhg4c12u:301: baladevaḥ - tathātma-yāthātmyaṃ śrutvaivātmāṃśino mama kevalāṃ bhaktiṃ ye kurvanti,
GE07bhg4c12u:303: teṣāṃ tu kevalayā mad-bhaktyaiva mat-prāptir acireṇaiva syād ity āha ye tv iti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c12u:304: ye mad-ekāntino mayi mat-prāpty-arthaṃ sarvāṇi sva-vihitāny api karmāṇi saṃnyasya
GE07bhg4c12u:306: kevalena mac-chravaṇādi-lakṣaṇena yogenopāyena māṃ kṛṣṇam upāsate /
GE07bhg4c12u:307: tal-lakṣaṇāṃ mad-upāsanāṃ kurvanti dhyāyantaḥ śravaṇādi-kāle 'pi man-niviṣṭa-manasaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:308: teṣāṃ mayy āveśita-cetasāṃ mad-ekānurakta-manasāṃ bhaktānām aham eva mṛtyu-yuktāt saṃsārāt sāgaravad dustarāt samuddhartā bhavāmi /
GE07bhg4c12u:309: na cirāt tvarayā tat-prāpti-vilambāsahamānas tān ahaṃ garuḍa-skandham āropya sva-dhāma
GE07bhg4c12u:311: nayāmi paramaṃ sthānam arcir ādi-gatiṃ vinā /
GE07bhg4c12u:316: tayā vinā tad āpnoti naro nārāyaṇāśrayaḥ //
GE07bhg4c12u:319: sukhena yāṃ gatiṃ yānti na tāṃ sarve 'pi dhārmikāḥ //
GE07bhg4c12u:322: mayy eva mana ādhatsva mayi buddhiṃ niveśaya /
GE07bhg4c12u:323: nivasiṣyasi mayy eva ata ūrdhvaṃ na saṃśayaḥ //8//
GE07bhg4c12u:324: śrīdharaḥ - yasmād evaṃ tasmāt mayy eveti /
GE07bhg4c12u:325: mayy eva saṅkalpa-vikalpātmakaṃ mana ādhatsva sthirīkuru /
GE07bhg4c12u:326: buddhim api vyavasāyātmikāṃ mayy eva niveśaya /
GE07bhg4c12u:327: evaṃ kurvan mat-prasādena labdha-jñānaḥ san ata ata ūrdhvaṃ dehānte mayy eva nivasiṣyasi nivatsyasi /
GE07bhg4c12u:330: yathā ca śrutiḥ dehānte devaḥ paraṃ brahmā tārakaṃ vyacaṣṭe iti //8//
GE07bhg4c12u:331: madhusūdanaḥ - tad evam iyatā prabandhena saguṇopāsanāṃ stutvedānīṃ vidhatte mayy eveti /
GE07bhg4c12u:332: mayy eva saguṇe brahmaṇi manaḥ saṅkalpa-vikalpātmakam ādhatsva sthāpaya sarvā manovṛttīr mad-viṣayā eva kuru /
GE07bhg4c12u:333: eva-kārānuṣaṅgena mayy eva buddhim adhyavasāya-lakṣaṇāṃ niveśaya /
GE07bhg4c12u:336: tataḥ kiṃ syād ity ata āha nivasiṣyasi nivatsyasi labdha-jñānaḥ san mad-ātmanā mayy eva śuddha ata ūrdhvam etad-dehānte na saṃśayo nātra pratibandha-śaṅkā kartavyety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:337: eva ata ūrdhvam ity atra sandhy-abhāvaḥ śloka-pūraṇārthaḥ //8//
GE07bhg4c12u:338: viśvanāthaḥ --- yasmān mad-bhaktir eva śreṣṭhā tasmāt tvaṃ bhaktim eva kurv iti tām upadiśati mayy eveti tribhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:340: mayi śyāmasundare pītāmbare vanamālini mana ādhatsva mat-smaraṇaṃ kurv ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:341: tathā buddhiṃ vivekavatīṃ niveśaya man-mananaṃ kurv ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:343: tataś ca mayy eva nivasiṣyasīti chāndasam /
GE07bhg4c12u:345: baladevaḥ -- yasmād evaṃ tasmāt tvaṃ mayy eva na tu svātmani mana ādhatsva samāhitaṃ kuru /
GE07bhg4c12u:347: evaṃ kurvāṇas tvaṃ mayy eva mama kṛṣṇasya sannidhāv eva nivatsyasi,
GE07bhg4c12u:348: na tu sa-niṣṭhavat sargādikam anubhavann aiśvarya-pradhānaṃ māṃ prāpsyasīty arthaḥ //8//
GE07bhg4c12u:350: atha cittaṃ samādhātuṃ na śaknoṣi mayi sthiram /
GE07bhg4c12u:352: śrīdharaḥ - atrāśaktaṃ prati sugamopāyam āha atheti /
GE07bhg4c12u:353: sthiraṃ yathā bhavaty evaṃ mayi cittaṃ dhārayituṃ yadi śakto na bhavasi tarhi vikṣiptaṃ
GE07bhg4c12u:354: cittaṃ punaḥ punaḥ pratyāhṛtya mad-anusmaraṇa-lakṣaṇo yo 'bhyāsa-yogas tena māṃ prāptum iccha /
GE07bhg4c12u:356: madhusūdanaḥ - idānīṃ saguṇa-brahma-dhyānāśaktānām aśakti-tāratāmyena prathamaṃ pratimādau
GE07bhg4c12u:357: bāhye bhagavad-dhyānābhyāsas tad-aśaktau bhāgavata-dharmānuṣṭhānaṃ tad-aśaktau sarva-karma-phala-tyāga
GE07bhg4c12u:358: iti trīṇi sādhanāni tribhiḥ ślokair vidhatte atheti /
GE07bhg4c12u:359: atha pakṣāntare sthiraṃ yathā syāt tathā cittaṃ samādhātuṃ sthāpayituṃ mayi na śaknoṣi
GE07bhg4c12u:360: cet tata ekasmin pratimādāv ālambane sarvataḥ samāhṛtya cetasaḥ punaḥ punaḥ sthāpanam
GE07bhg4c12u:361: abhyāsas tat-pūrvako yogaḥ samādhis tenābhyāsa-yogena mām āptum iccha yatasva /
GE07bhg4c12u:363: bahūn śatrūn jitvā dhanam āhṛtavān asi rājasūyādy-artham ekaṃ manaḥ-śatruṃ jitvā tatva-jñāna-dhanam āhariṣyasīti na tavāścaryam iti sambodhanārthaḥ
GE07bhg4c12u:364: viśvanāthaḥ --- sākṣāt smaraṇāsamarthaṃ prati tat-prāpty-upāyam āha atheti /
GE07bhg4c12u:365: abhyāsa-yogenānyatrānyatra gatam api manaḥ punaḥ pratyāhṛtya mad-rūpa eva sthāpanam abhyāsaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:367: prākṛtatvād iti kutsita-rūpa-rasādiṣu calantyā manonadyās teṣu calanaṃ nirudhya atisubhadreṣu madīya-rūpa-rasādiṣu tac-calanaṃ śanaiḥ śanaiḥ sampādayety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:368: he dhanañjayeti bahūn śatrūn jitvā dhanam āhṛtavatā tvayā mano 'pi jitvā dhyāna-dhanaṃ grahītuṃ śakyam eveti bhāvaḥ //9//
GE07bhg4c12u:369: baladevaḥ - nanu gaṅgeva yeṣāṃ mano-vṛtti-rodhavatī teṣāṃ tvat-prāptis tvarayā syān mama tu tādṛśī na tad-vṛttis tataḥ kathaṃ seti cet tatrāha atheti /
GE07bhg4c12u:370: sthiraṃ yathā syāt tathā mayi cittaṃ samyag anāyāsenādhātum arpayituṃ na śaknoṣi cet tato 'bhyāsa-yogena mām āptum iccha yatasva /
GE07bhg4c12u:371: tato 'nyatra gatasya manasaḥ pratyāhṛtya śanaiḥ śanair mayi sthāpanam abhyāsas tena manasi mat-pravaṇe sati mat-prāptiḥ sulabhā syād iti bhāvaḥ
GE07bhg4c12u:374: mad-artham api karmāṇi kurvan siddhim avāpsyasi //10//
GE07bhg4c12u:375: śrīdharaḥ - yadi punar naivaṃ tatrāha abhyāsa iti /
GE07bhg4c12u:376: yadi punar abhyāse 'py aśakto 'si tarhi mat-prīty-arthāni yāni karmāṇi ekādaśy-upavāsa-vrata-caryā-pūjā-nāma-saṅkīrtanādīni tad-anuṣṭhānam eva paramaṃ yasya tādṛśo bhava /
GE07bhg4c12u:377: evaṃ-bhūtāni karmāṇy api mad-arthaṃ kurvan mokṣaṃ prāpsyasi //10//
GE07bhg4c12u:378: madhusūdanaḥ - mat-prīṇanārthaṃ karma mat-karma śravaṇa-kīrtanādi-bhāgavata-dharmas tat-paramas tad-eka-niṣṭho bhava /
GE07bhg4c12u:379: abhyāsāsamarthye mad-arthaṃ bhāgavata-dharma-saṃjñakāni karmāṇy api kurvan siddhiṃ brahma-bhāva-lakṣaṇāṃ sattva-śuddhi-jñānotpatti-dvāreṇāvāpsyasi
GE07bhg4c12u:380: viśvanāthaḥ --- abhyāse 'pīti yathā pitta-dūṣitā rasanā matsyaṇḍikāṃ necchati /
GE07bhg4c12u:381: tathaivāvidyā-dūṣitaṃ manas tad-rūpādikaṃ madhuram api na gṛhṇātīty atas tena durgraheṇa mahā-prabalena manasā saha yoddhuṃ mayā naiva śakyata iti manyase ced iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:384: kurvan vināpi mat-smaraṇaṃ siddhiṃ premavat-pārṣadatva-lakṣaṇāṃ prāpsyatīti //10 //
GE07bhg4c12u:385: baladevaḥ - nanu vāyor iva manaso 'ticāpalyāt tasya pratyāhāre mama na śaktir iti cet tatrāha abhyāse 'pīti /
GE07bhg4c12u:386: ukta-lakṣaṇe 'bhyāse 'pi cet tvam asamarthas tarhi mat-karmāṇi paramāṇi pumartha-bhūtāni yasya tādṛśo bhava /
GE07bhg4c12u:388: evaṃ sukarāṇi mad-arthāni karmāṇi kurvāṇas tvaṃ tatra tarāti-manojña-man-mūrty-uddeśa-mahimnā
GE07bhg4c12u:389: tādṛśe mayi nirata-manāḥ saṃsiddhiṃ mat-sāmīpya-lakṣaṇām avāpsyasīty atisugamo 'yam upāyaḥ //10 //
GE07bhg4c12u:391: athaitad apy aśakto 'si kartuṃ mad-yogam āśritaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:393: śrīdharaḥ - atyantaṃ bhagavad-dharma-pariniṣṭhāyām aśaktasya pakṣāntaram āha atheti /
GE07bhg4c12u:394: yady etad api kartuṃ na śaknoṣi tarhi mad-ayogaṃ mad-eka-śaraṇatvam āśritaḥ san sarveṣāṃ
GE07bhg4c12u:395: dṛṣṭādṛṣṭārthānām āvaśyakānāṃ cāgnihotrādi-karmaṇāṃ phalāni niyata-cittaṃ bhūs tvā parityaja /
GE07bhg4c12u:396: etad uktaṃ bhavati mayā tāvad īśvarājñayā yathā-śakti karmāṇi kartavyāni /
GE07bhg4c12u:397: phalaṃ tāvad dṛṣṭam adṛṣṭaṃ vā parameśvarādhīnam ity evaṃ mayi bhāram āropya phalāsaktiṃ parityajya vartamāno mat-prasādena kṛtārtho bhaviṣyasīti
GE07bhg4c12u:398: madhusūdanaḥ - atha bahir-viṣayākṛṣṭa-cetastvād etan-mat-karma-paratvam api kartuṃ na śaknoṣi,
GE07bhg4c12u:399: tato mad-yogaṃ mad-eka-śaraṇatvam āśrito mayi sarva-karma-samarpaṇaṃ mad-yogas taṃ
GE07bhg4c12u:400: vāśritaḥ san yatātmavān yataḥ saṃyata-sarvendriya ātmavān vivekī ca san sarva-karma-phala-tyāgaṃ
GE07bhg4c12u:402: viśvanāthaḥ --- etad api kartum aśaktaś cet tarhi mad-yogam āśrito mayi sarva-karma-samarpaṇam /
GE07bhg4c12u:403: mad-yogas tam āśritaḥ san sarva-karma-phala-tyāgaṃ prathama-ṣaṭkoktaṃ kuru /
GE07bhg4c12u:404: ayam arthaḥ -- prathama-ṣaṭke bhagavad-arpita-niṣkāma-karma-yoga eva mokṣopāya uktaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:409: mananātmakaś cākhaṇḍa-smaraṇāsāmarthye tad-anurāgināṃ tad-abhyāsa-rūpaṃ ceti trika evāyaṃ manda-dhiyāṃ durgamaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:411: dvitīyaḥ śravaṇa-kīrtanātmakaṃ tu sarveṣāṃ sugama evopāyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:414: etat-kṛtya-samarthā indriyāṇāṃ bhagavan-niṣṭhīkṛtāv aśraddhālavaś ca bhagavad-arpita-niṣkāma-karmiṇaḥ prathama-ṣaṭkotādhikāriṇo 'smān nikṛṣṭā eveti //11//
GE07bhg4c12u:415: baladevaḥ - atha mahākulīnatva-loka-mukhyatvādinā pratibandhena bādhitas tvam anyo
GE07bhg4c12u:416: vai tan-man-niketa-vimārjanādi-mat-prītikara-mati-sukaram api karma cet kartum aśakto
GE07bhg4c12u:417: 'si tato mad-yogaṃ mac-charaṇatām āśritaḥ san sarveṣām anuṣṭhīyamānānāṃ karmaṇāṃ
GE07bhg4c12u:421: 'bhyudite sva-śeṣiṇi sarvottamatvena vidite śanaiḥ śanaiḥ parāpi bhaktiḥ syād iti /
GE07bhg4c12u:422: evam eva vakṣyati yataḥ pravṛttir bhūtānāṃ ity ādinā mad-bhaktiṃ labhate parām ity anena //11//
GE07bhg4c12u:424: śreyo hi jñānam abhyāsāj jñānād dhyānaṃ viśiṣyate /
GE07bhg4c12u:426: śrīdharaḥ - tam imaṃ phala-tyāgaṃ stauti śreya iti /
GE07bhg4c12u:429: tatas tu taṃ paśyati niṣkalaṃ dhyāyamāna iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:431: tasmād evaṃbhūtāt karma-phala-tyāgāt karmasu tat-phaleṣu cāsakti-nivṛttyā mat-prasādena ca samanantaram eva saṃsāra-śāntir bhavati //12//
GE07bhg4c12u:432: madhusūdanaḥ - idānīm atraiva sādhana-vidhāna-prayavasānād imaṃ sarva-phala-tyāgaṃ stauti śreya iti /
GE07bhg4c12u:433: śreyaḥ praśasyataraṃ hi eva jñānaṃ śabda-yuktibhyām ātma-niścayo 'bhyāsā jñānārtha-śravaṇābhyāsāt /
GE07bhg4c12u:434: jñānāc chravaṇa-manana-pariniṣpannād api dhyānaṃ nididhyāsana-saṃjñaṃ viśiṣyate 'tiśayitaṃ bhavati sākṣātkārāvyavahita-hetutvāt /
GE07bhg4c12u:435: tad evaṃ sarva-sādhana-śreṣṭhaṃ dhyānaṃ tato 'py atiśayitatvenājña-kṛtaḥ karma-phala-tyāgaḥ stūyate /
GE07bhg4c12u:437: tyāgān niyata-cittena puṃsā kṛtāt sarva-karma-phala-tyāgāc chāntir upaśamaḥ sa-hetukasya saṃsārasyānantaram apy avadhānena na tu kālāntaram apekṣate / atra -
GE07bhg4c12u:438: yadā sarve pramucyante kāmā ye 'sya hṛdi sthitāḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:439: atha martyo 'mṛto bhavaty atra brahma samaśnute //
GE07bhg4c12u:440: ity ādi śrutiṣu prajahāti yadā kāmān sarvān ity ādi-sthita-prajña-lakṣaṇeṣu ca sarva-kāma-tyāgasyāmṛtatva-sādhanatvam avagatam /
GE07bhg4c12u:441: karma-phalāni ca kāmās tat-tyāgo 'pi kāma-tyāgatva-sāmānyāt sarva-kāma-tyāga-phalena stūyate /
GE07bhg4c12u:443: yathā vā jāmadagnyena brāhmaṇena niḥkṣatrā pṛthivī kṛteti bāhmaṇatva-sāmānyād idānīntanā api brāhmaṇā aparimeya-parākramatvena stūyante tadvat
GE07bhg4c12u:444: viśvanāthaḥ --- athoktānāṃ smaraṇa-mananābhyāsānāṃ yathā-pūrvaṃ śraiṣṭhyaṃ spaṣṭīkṛyāha śreyo hīti /
GE07bhg4c12u:445: abhyāsāj jñānaṃ mayi buddhiṃ niveśayety uktaṃ man-mananaṃ śreyaḥ śreṣṭham /
GE07bhg4c12u:446: abhyāse saty āyāsata eva dhyānaṃ syāt /
GE07bhg4c12u:447: manane sati tv anāyāsata eva dhyānam iti viśeṣāt tasmāt jñānād api dhyānaṃ viśiṣyate śreṣṭham ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:448: kuta ity ata āha - dhyānāt karma-phalānāṃ svargādi-sukhānāṃ niṣkāma-karma-phalasya mokṣasya ca tyāgas tat-spṛhā-rāhityaṃ syāt /
GE07bhg4c12u:450: niścala-dhyānāt pūrvaṃ tu bhaktānām ajāta-ratīnāṃ mokṣa-tyāgecchaiva bhavet /
GE07bhg4c12u:453: yad uktaṃ bhakti-rasāmṛta-sindhau - kleśa-ghnī śubhadā [BRS 1.1.7] ity atra ṣaḍbhiḥ
GE07bhg4c12u:454: padair etan-māhātmyaṃ kīrtitam iti / yad uktaṃ -
GE07bhg4c12u:460: tyāgād vaitṛṣṇyād anantaram eva śāntir mad-rūpa-guṇādikaṃ vinā sarva-viṣayeṣv evendriyāṇām uparatiḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:461: atra pūrvārdhe śreyaḥ iti viśiṣyate iti pada-dvayenānvayād uttarārdhe tu anantaram ity anenaivānvayād eṣaiva vyākhyā samyag upapadyate nānyety avadheyam //12//
GE07bhg4c12u:462: baladevaḥ - sukaratvād apramādatvāj jñāna-garbhatvāc cānibhisaṃhitaṃ phalaṃ karma-yogaṃ stauti śreyo hīti /
GE07bhg4c12u:463: abhyāsān mat-smṛti-sātatya-rūpād aniṣpannāj jñānaṃ svātma-sākṣātkṛti-rūpaṃ śreyaḥ praśastataram /
GE07bhg4c12u:464: paramātmopalabdhi-dvāratvāt jñānāc ca tasmād aniṣpannāt sādhana-bhūtaṃ dhyānaṃ svātma-cintana-lakṣaṇaṃ viśiṣyate sva-hitatve śreyo bhavati /
GE07bhg4c12u:465: dhyānāc ca tasmād aniṣpannāt karma-phala-tyāgād anantaraṃ śāntis tyakta-phalād anuṣṭhitā karmaṇo 'nantaraṃ manaḥ-śuddhir ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:466: tathā ca śuddhe manasi dhyānaṃ niṣpadyate /
GE07bhg4c12u:469: tena parā bhaktis tayiśvarya-pradhānasya mama prāptir iti durgamo 'yam upāya iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:472: san-niṣṭhā niṣkāma-karma-ratā hari-dhyāyinaś ca svātmānam anubhūya tato 'bhyuditayā
GE07bhg4c12u:473: hari-viṣayakatyā pāramaiśvarya-guṇayā parayā bhaktyā hariṃ premāspadam anubhavanto
GE07bhg4c12u:477: adveṣṭā sarva-bhūtānāṃ maitraḥ karuṇa eva ca /
GE07bhg4c12u:480: mayy arpita-mano-buddhir yo mad-bhaktaḥ sa me priyaḥ //14//
GE07bhg4c12u:481: śrīdharaḥ - evaṃ-bhūtasya bhaktasya kṣipram eva parameśvara-prasāda-hetūn dharmān āha adveṣṭety aṣṭabhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:482: sarva-bhūtānāṃ yathāyatham adveṣṭā maitraḥ karuṇaś ca /
GE07bhg4c12u:486: nirmamo nirahaṃkāraś ca kṛpālutvād eva anyaiḥ saha same duḥkha-sukhe yasya saḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:493: evaṃbhūto yo mad-bhaktaḥ sa me priyaḥ //14//
GE07bhg4c12u:494: madhusūdanaḥ - tad evaṃ mandam adhikāriṇaṃ pratyatiduṣkaratvenākṣaropāsana-nindayā
GE07bhg4c12u:495: sukaraṃ saguṇopāsanaṃ vidhāyāśakti-tāratamyānuvādenānyāny api sādhanāni vidadhau
GE07bhg4c12u:496: bhagavān vāsudevaḥ kathaṃ nu nāma sarva-pratibandha-rahitaḥ sann uttamādhikāritayā
GE07bhg4c12u:497: phala-bhūtāyām akṣara-vidyāyām avatared ity abhiprāyeṇa sādhana-vidhānasya phalārthatvāt / tad uktam -
GE07bhg4c12u:502: bhagavatā patañjalinā coktaṃ samādhi-siddhir īśvara-praṇidhānāt iti /
GE07bhg4c12u:503: tataḥ pratyak-cetanādhigamo 'py antarāyābhāvaś ca iti ca /
GE07bhg4c12u:505: tad evam akṣaropāsana-nindā saguṇopāsana-stutaye na tu heyatayā,
GE07bhg4c12u:507: na hi nindā nindyaṃ nindituṃ pravartate 'pi tu vidheyaṃ stotum iti nyāyāt /
GE07bhg4c12u:509: priyo hi jñānino 'tyartham ahaṃ sa ca mama priyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:510: udārāḥ sarva evaite jñānī tv ātmaiva me matam // [Gītā 7.17-18]
GE07bhg4c12u:511: ity ādinā punaḥ punaḥ praśastatamatayoktās teṣām eva jñānaṃ dharma-jātaṃ cānusaraṇīyam
GE07bhg4c12u:512: adhikāram āsādya tvayety arjunaṃ bubodhayiṣuḥ parama-hitaiṣī bhagavān abheda-darśinaḥ
GE07bhg4c12u:514: sarvāṇi bhūtāny ātmatvena paśyann ātmano duḥkha-hetāv api pratikūla-buddhy-abhāvān na dveṣṭā sarva-bhūtānāṃ kintu maitrī snigdhatā tadvān /
GE07bhg4c12u:515: yataḥ karuṇaḥ karuṇā duḥkhiteṣu dayā tadvān sarva-bhūtābhaya-dātā paramahaṃsa-parivrājaka ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:518: dveṣa-rāgayor apravartakatvena same duḥkha-sukhe yasya saḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:519: ataeva kṣamī ākrośana-tāḍanādināpi na vikriyām āpadyate //13//
GE07bhg4c12u:521: satataṃ śarīra-sthiti-kāraṇasya lābhe 'lābhe ca saṃtuṣṭaḥ utpannālaṃ-pratyayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:526: dṛḍhaḥ kutārkikair abhibhavitum aśakyatayā sthiro niścayo 'ham asmy akaartra-bhloktṛ-saccidānandādvitīyaṃ brahmety adhyavasāyo yasya sa dṛḍha-niścayaḥ sthita-prajña ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:527: mayi bhagavati vāsudeve śuddhe brahmaṇi arpita-mano-buddhiḥ samarpitāntaḥ-karaṇaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:528: īdṛśo yo mad-bhaktaḥ śuddhākṣara-brahmavit sa me priyaḥ,
GE07bhg4c12u:530: viśvanāthaḥ --- etādṛśyāḥ śāntyā bhaktaḥ kīdṛśo bhavatīty apekṣāyāṃ bahuvidha-bhaktānāṃ svabhāva-bhedān āha adveṣṭety aṣṭabhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:531: adveṣṭā dviṣatsv api dveṣaṃ na karoti pratyuta mitro mitratayā vartate /
GE07bhg4c12u:532: karuṇa eṣām asad-gatir mā bhavatv iti buddhyā teṣu kṛpāluḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:533: nanu kīdṛśena vivekena dviṣatsv api maitrī-kāruṇye syātām /
GE07bhg4c12u:534: tatra vivekaṃ vinaivety āha nirmamo nirahaṃkāra iti putra-kalatrādiṣu mamatvābhāvād dehe cāhaṅkārābhāvāt tasya mad-bhaktasya kvāpi dveṣa eva naiva phalati /
GE07bhg4c12u:535: kutaḥ punar dveṣa-janita-duḥkha-śānty-arthaṃ tena vivekaḥ svīkartavya iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:536: nanu tad apy anya-kṛta-pāduka-muṣṭi-prahārādibhir deha-vyathādīnaṃ duḥkhaṃ kiṃcid bhavaty eva ?
GE07bhg4c12u:542: tac ca mama prārabdha-phalam idam avśya-bhogyam iti bhāvanā-mayam /
GE07bhg4c12u:543: sāmye 'pi sahiṣṇuvaiva duḥkhaṃ sahyata ity āha kṣamī kṣamavān /
GE07bhg4c12u:545: nanv etādṛśasya bhaktasya jīvikā kathaṃ sidhyet ?
GE07bhg4c12u:547: yadṛcchopasthite kiṃcid yatnopasthite vā bhakṣya-vastuni santuṣṭaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:549: tat kathaṃ svabhakṣam ālakṣya santuṣṭa iti tatrāha satataṃ yogī bhakti-yoga-yukto bhakti-siddhārtham iti bhāvaḥ / yad uktaṃ-
GE07bhg4c12u:551: tattvaṃ vimṛśyate tena tad vijñāya paraṃ vrajet // iti /
GE07bhg4c12u:552: kiṃ ca deivād aprāpta-bhaikṣyo 'pi yatātmā saṃyata-cittaḥ kṣobha-rahita ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:553: daivāc citta-kṣobhe saty api tad-upaśamārtham aṣṭāṅga-yogābhyāsādikaṃ naiva karotīty āha dṛḍha-niścayo 'nanya-bhaktir eva me kartavyeti niścayas tasya na śithilībhavatīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:554: sarvatra hetuḥ mayy arpita-mano-buddhir mat-smaraṇa-manana-parāyaṇa ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:555: īdṛśo bhaktas tu me priyo mām atiprīṇayatīty arthaḥ //13-14//
GE07bhg4c12u:556: baladevaḥ - evam ekānti-bhaktān pariniṣṭhitādīn anekānti-bhaktān saniṣṭhāṃś ca tat-tat-sādhana-bhedair upavarṇya teṣāṃ sarvoparañjakān guṇān vidadhāti adveṣṭeti saptabhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:557: sarva-bhūtānām adveṣṭā dveṣaṃ kurvatsv api teṣu mat-prārabhdānuguṇa-pareśa-preritāny amūni mahyaṃ dviṣantīti dveṣa-śūnyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:559: kenacin nimittena khinneṣu mābhūd eṣāṃ kheda iti karuṇaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:560: dehādiṣu nirmamaḥ prakṛter amī vikārā na mameti teṣu mamatā-śūnyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:562: sama-duḥkha-sukhaḥ sukhe sati harṣeṇa duḥkhe sati udvegena cāvyākulaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:567: dṛḍha-niścayo dṛḍhaḥ kutarkair abhibhavitum aśakyatayā sthiro niścayo hareḥ kiṅkaro 'smīti adhyavasāyo yasya saḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:569: evaṃ-bhūto yo mad-bhaktaḥ sa me priyaḥ prīti-kartā //13-14//
GE07bhg4c12u:571: yasmān nodvijate loko lokān nodvijate ca yaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:572: harṣāmarṣa-bhayodvegair mukto yaḥ sa ca me priyaḥ //15//
GE07bhg4c12u:574: yasmāt sakāśāl loko jano nodvijate bhaya-śaṅkayā saṃkṣobhaṃ na prāpnoti /
GE07bhg4c12u:581: etair vimukto yo mad-bhaktaḥ sa ca me priyaḥ //15//
GE07bhg4c12u:582: madhusūdanaḥ - punas tasyaiva viśeṣaṇāni yasmād iti /
GE07bhg4c12u:583: yasmāt sarva-bhūtābhaya-dāyinaḥ saṃnyāsino hetor nodvijate na santapyate loko yaḥ kaścid api janaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:584: tathā lokān niraparādhodvejanaika-vratāt khala-janān nodvijate ca yaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:586: kiṃ ca harṣaḥ svasya priya-lābhe romāñcāśru-pātādi-hetur ānandābhivyañjakaś citta-vṛtti-viśeṣaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:589: udvega ekākī kathaṃ vijane sarva-parigraha-śūnyo jīviṣyāmīty evaṃvidho vyākulatā-rūpaś citta-vṛtti-viśeṣas tair harṣāmarṣa-bhayodvegair mukto yaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:590: advaita-darśitayā tad-ayogyatvena tair eva svayaṃ parityakto na tu teṣāṃ tyāgāya svayaṃ vyāpṛta iti yāvat
GE07bhg4c12u:592: īdṛśo mad-bhakto yaḥ sa me priya iti pūrvavat //15//
GE07bhg4c12u:593: viśvanāthaḥ --- kiṃ ca yasyāsti bhaktir bhagavaty akiṃcanā sarvair guṇais tatra samāsate
GE07bhg4c12u:594: surāḥ [BhP 5.18.12] ity-ādy-ukter mat-prīti-janakā anye 'pi guṇā mad-bhaktyā muhur
GE07bhg4c12u:596: tān api tvaṃ śṛṇv ity āha /
GE07bhg4c12u:598: harṣādibhIḥ prākṛtair harṣāmarṣa-bhayodvegair mukta ity ādinoktān api kāṃścid guṇān durlabhatva-jñāpanārthaṃ punar āha yo na hṛṣyatīti //15//
GE07bhg4c12u:599: baladevaḥ - yasmāl lokaḥ ko 'pi jano nodvijate bhaya-śaṅkayā kṣobhaṃ na labhate /
GE07bhg4c12u:600: yaḥ kāruṇikatvāj janodvejakaṃ karma na karoti /
GE07bhg4c12u:601: lokāc ca yo nodvijate sarvāvirodhitva-viniścayād yad-udvejakaṃ karma loko na karoti /
GE07bhg4c12u:603: na tu teṣāṃ mocane svayaṃ vyāpārī /
GE07bhg4c12u:608: kathaṃ nirudyamasya mama jīvanam iti vikṣobhas tūdvegaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:612: sarvārambha-parityāgī yo mad-bhaktaḥ sa me priyaḥ //16//
GE07bhg4c12u:619: sarvān dṛṣṭādṛṣṭārthān ārambhānudyamān parityaktuṃ śīlaṃ yasya saḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:620: evaṃ-bhūtaḥ san yo mad-bhaktaḥ sa me priyaḥ //16//
GE07bhg4c12u:622: nirapekṣaḥ sarveṣu bhogopakaraṇeṣu yadṛcchopanīteṣv api niḥspṛhaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:624: dakṣa upasthiteṣu jñātavyeṣu kartavyeṣu ca sadya eva jñātuṃ kartuṃ ca samarthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:625: udāsīno na kasyacin mitrādeḥ pakṣaṃ bhajate yaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:626: gata-vyathaḥ parais tāḍyamānasyāpi gatā notpannā vyathā pīḍā yasya saḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:627: utpannāyām api vyathāyām apakarṛṣv anapakartṛtvaṃ kṣamitvam /
GE07bhg4c12u:628: vyathā-kāraṇeṣu satsv apy anutpanna-vyathatvaṃ gata-gata-vyathatvam iti bhedaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:629: aihikāmuṣmika-phalāni sarvāṇi karmāṇi sarvārambhās tān parityaktuṃ śīlaṃ yasya sa sarvārambha-parityāgī sannyāsī yo mad-bhaktaḥ sa me priyaḥ
GE07bhg4c12u:630: viśvanāthaḥ --- anapekṣo vyavahārika-kāryāpekṣā-rahita udāsīno vyavahārika-lokeṣv anāsaktaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:631: sarvān vyavahārikān dṛṣṭādṛṣṭārthāṃs tathā pāramārthikān api kāṃścit śāstrādhyāpanādīn ārambhān udyamān parihartuṃ śīlaṃ yasya saḥ //16//
GE07bhg4c12u:632: baladevaḥ - anapekṣaḥ svayam āgate 'pi bhogye nispṛhaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:639: yo na hṛṣyati na dveṣṭi na śocati na kāṅkṣati /
GE07bhg4c12u:640: śubhāśubha-parityāgī bhaktimān yaḥ sa me priyaḥ //17//
GE07bhg4c12u:646: śubhāśubhe puṇya-pāpe parityaktuṃ śīlaṃ yasya saḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:647: evaṃ-bhūto bhūtvā yo mad-bhaktimān sa me priyaḥ //17//
GE07bhg4c12u:651: na dveṣṭi aniṣṭa-prāptau na śocati prāpteṣṭa-viyoge /
GE07bhg4c12u:653: sarvārambha-parityāgīty etad vivṛṇoti śubhāśubhe sukha-sādhana-duḥkha-sādhane karmaṇī parityaktuṃ śīlam asyeti śubhāśubha-parityāgī bhaktimān yaḥ sa me priyaḥ //17//
GE07bhg4c12u:655: baladevaḥ - yaḥ priyaṃ putra-śiṣyādi prāpya na hṛṣyati /
GE07bhg4c12u:656: apriyaṃ tat prāpya tatra na dveṣṭi /
GE07bhg4c12u:659: śubhaṃ puṇyam aśubhaṃ pāpaṃ tad-ubhayaṃ pratibandhakatva-sāmyāt parityaktuṃ śīlaṃ yasya saḥ //17//
GE07bhg4c12u:661: samaḥ śatrau ca mitre ca tathā mānāpamānayoḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:664: aniketaḥ sthira-matir bhaktimān me priyo naraḥ //19//
GE07bhg4c12u:666: śatrau ca mitre ca sama eka-rūpaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:677: evaṃ-bhūto bhaktimān yaḥ sa naro mama priyaḥ //19//
GE07bhg4c12u:685: te duḥkha-sukhājanakatayā tulye yasya sa tathā /
GE07bhg4c12u:687: nanu śarīra-yātrā-nirvāhāya vāg-vyāpāro 'pekṣita eva nety āha saṃtuṣṭo nivṛtta-spṛhaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:689: sthirā paramārtha-vastu-viṣayā matir yasya sa sthira-matiḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:690: īdṛśo yo bhaktimān sa me priyo naraḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:691: atra punaḥ punar bhakter upādānaṃ bhaktir evāpavargasya puṣkalaṃ kāraṇam iti draḍhayitum //19//
GE07bhg4c12u:695: tulyeti nindayā duḥkhaṃ stutyā sukhaṃ ca yo na vindati /
GE07bhg4c12u:697: yena kenacid adṛṣṭākṛṣṭena rukṣeṇa snigdhena vānnādinā santuṣṭaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:700: eṣv adveṣṭety ādiṣu saptasu yeṣu guṇānāṃ punar apy abhidhānaṃ tat teṣām atidaurlabhya-jñāpanārtham ity adoṣaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:701: san-niṣṭhādīnāṃ tri-vidhānāṃ bhaktānāṃ sambhūya sthitā ete 'dveṣṭṛtvādayo dharmā yathā-sambhava-tāratamyenaiva sudhībhiḥ saṅgamanīyāḥ //18-19//
GE07bhg4c12u:703: ye tu dharmyāmṛtam idaṃ yathoktaṃ paryupāsate /
GE07bhg4c12u:704: śraddadhānā mat-paramā bhaktās te 'tīva me priyāḥ //20//
GE07bhg4c12u:705: śrīdharaḥ : uktaṃ dharma-jātaṃ sapahalam upasaṃharati ye tv iti /
GE07bhg4c12u:718: adveṣṭety ādinākṣaropāsakādīnāṃ jīvanmuktānāṃ saṃnyāsināṃ lakṣaṇa-bhūtaṃ svabhāva-siddhaṃ dharma-jāta-muktam /
GE07bhg4c12u:721: ayatnato bhavanty eva na tu sādhana-rūpiṇaḥ // iti /
GE07bhg4c12u:723: tad idaṃ dharma-jātaṃ prayatnena sampādyamānaṃ mumukṣor mokṣa-sādhanaṃ bhavatīti pratipādayann upasaṃharati ye tv iti /
GE07bhg4c12u:724: ye tu saṃnyāsino mumukṣavo dharmāmṛtaṃ dharma-rūpam amṛta-sādhanatvād amṛtavad āsvādyatvād
GE07bhg4c12u:725: vedaṃ yathoktam adveṣṭā sarva-bhūtānām ity ādinā pratipāditaṃ paryupāsate 'nutiṣṭhanti
GE07bhg4c12u:726: prayatnena śraddadhānāḥ santo mat-paramā ahaṃ bhagavān akṣarātmā vāsudeva eva paramaḥ
GE07bhg4c12u:727: prāptavyo niratiśayā gatir yeṣāṃ te mat-paramā bhaktā māṃ nirupādhikaṃ brahma bhajamānās
GE07bhg4c12u:729: priyo hi jñānino 'tyartham ahaṃ sa ca mama priyaḥ iti pūrva-sūcitasyāyam upasaṃhāraḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:730: yasmād dharmāmṛtam idaṃ śraddhayānutiṣṭhan bhagavato viṣṇoḥ parameśvarasyātīva priyo
GE07bhg4c12u:731: bhavati tasmād idaṃ jñānavataḥ svabhāva-siddhatayā lakṣaṇam api mumukṣuṇātma-tattva-jijñāsunātma-jñānopāyatvena
GE07bhg4c12u:732: yatnād anuṣṭheyaṃ viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padaṃ jigamiṣuṇeti vākyārthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:740: uktavān bahuvidha-svabhakta-niṣṭhān dharmān upasaṃharan kārtsnyenaital-lipsūnāṃ tac-chravaṇa-vicāraṇādi-phalam āha ye tv iti /
GE07bhg4c12u:741: ete bhakty-uttha-śānty-uttha-dharmā na prākṛtā guṇāḥ bhaktyā tuṣyati kṛṣṇo na guṇaiḥ ity ukta-koṭitaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:743: ete tu tat-tat-sarva-sal-lakṣaṇepsavaḥ sādhakā api tebhyaḥ siddhebhyo 'pi śreṣṭhāḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:751: baladevaḥ : ukta-bhakti-yogam upasaṃharan tasmin niṣṭhā-phalam āha ye tv iti /
GE07bhg4c12u:752: ye bhaktā yathoktaṃ mayy āveśya mano ye mām ity ādibhir yathā-gatam idaṃ dharmāmṛtaṃ paryupāsate /
GE07bhg4c12u:753: prāpyaṃ mām iva prāpakaṃ tat samāśrayanti /
GE07bhg4c12u:754: śraddadhānā bhakti-śraddhā-lavo mat-paramā man-niratās te mamātīva priyā bhavanti //20//
GE07bhg4c12u:755: vaśaḥ svaika-juṣāṃ kṛṣṇaḥ sva-bhakty-eka-juṣāṃ tu saḥ /
